title: REST API Gateway to Private ALB and ECS Fargate via VPC Link V2
description: This pattern demonstrates REST API Gateway integration with a private Application Load Balancer and ECS Fargate cluster using VPC Link V2

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern deploys a REST API Gateway endpoint that integrates with a private Application Load Balancer using VPC Link V2
The private ALB routes traffic to an ECS Fargate cluster running containerized applications
The pattern creates all required security groups, IAM roles, and networking components for secure private integration
